text.text_translated: **Asteroids** are large rocks in space. They are called 'hazardous' if they pass within 7.5 million kilometres of Earth. NASA has created a map of 1,400 of these objects. However, none of them are expected to be a danger in the next one hundred years. With available technology, NASA can track these asteroids and predict a possible impact. If this happens, two different ways to protect Earth could be launched.
